name: Berry Yummy Salad
ingredients: 4 c. mixed grrens, red leaf and green leaf 1 small carton blueberries
2 thin sliced nectarines 2/3 c. roasted pecans
1 small carton sliced strawberries Poppy Seed Dressing
1 tsp. minced onion 1 tsp. dried minced onions
steps: Dressing: Put together and shake up.
